trans-unit.source: Represents controls that provide, and are able to switch between, multiple representations of the same set of information or child controls.
trans-unit.target: 지 동일한 정보 또는 자식 컨트롤 집합의 여러 표현 간을 전환할 수 있는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Examples of controls that can present multiple views include the list view (which can show its contents as thumbnails, tiles, icons, or details), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] charts (pie, line, bar, cell value with a formula), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] documents (normal, Web layout, print layout, reading layout, outline), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)] calendar (year, month, week, day) and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] skins.
trans-unit.target: 여러 뷰를 제공할 수 있는 컨트롤의 예로 목록 보기 (미리 보기, 타일, 아이콘 또는 세부 정보로 내용을 표시할 수)는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] 차트 (원형, 꺾은선형, 막대형, 수식이 있는 셀 값) [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] 문서 (보통, 웹 모양, 인쇄 모양, 읽기 레이아웃, 개요) [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)] 달력 (연도, 월, 주, 일) 및 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 스킨 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The supported views are determined by the control developer and are specific to each control.
trans-unit.target: 지원 되는 뷰는 컨트롤 개발자가 결정 됩니다 및 각 컨트롤에 따라 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 캐시 된 가져옵니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 속성 값이 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 캐시 된 속성 값 해야 이전에 요청에 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> 를 사용 하 여

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Current%2A>속성의 현재 값을 가져올 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 가능한 속성 및 사용에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 캐시 된 포함 된 구조체 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 의 컨트롤 패턴에 대 한 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 요청한 속성이 캐시에 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 가져옵니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 속성 값이 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: 이 패턴에서 가져와야는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>와 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>현재 값을 가져오기 위해 참조.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>사용 하 여 가져왔습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>만 캐시 데이터를 포함 하 고 모든 속성의 현재 값을 가져오려고 하면 예외가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Cached%2A>캐시 된 값을 이전에 수행 된 지정 된 속성에 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> 를 사용 하 여</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Cached%2A> 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 가능한 속성 및 사용에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 현재 포함 된 구조체 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 의 컨트롤 패턴에 대 한 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.CurrentView*> property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.CurrentView*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.CurrentView*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 자동화 공급자 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers> 해당 필드를 사용 해야

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of a control-specific view.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤별 보기의 이름을 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: View identifiers can be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A> 를 사용 하 여 뷰 식별자를 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤별 보기 식별자 컬렉션은 인스턴스 간에 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: View names are suitable for use in Text to Speech, Braille, and other accessible applications.
trans-unit.target: 뷰 이름은 텍스트 읽어주기, 브라유 점자 및 기타 액세스할 수 있는 응용 프로그램에서 사용 하기 위해 적합 한지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The control-specific view identifier.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤별 보기 식별자입니다.

trans-unit.source: A localized string representing the control-specific view name.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤별 뷰 이름을 나타내는 지역화 된 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: viewId is not a member of the supported views collection.
trans-unit.target: viewId지원 되는 뷰 컬렉션의 구성원이 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"> </xref> 컨트롤 패턴.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 자동화 공급자 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers> 해당 필드를 사용 해야

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 패턴 식별자에 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> 에서 필요한 컨트롤 패턴을 검색 하</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> 는 등 메서드에 전달 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the current control-specific view.
trans-unit.target: 현재 컨트롤별 뷰를 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: View identifiers can be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A> 를 사용 하 여 뷰 식별자를 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤별 보기 식별자 컬렉션은 인스턴스 간에 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A control-specific view identifier.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤별 보기 식별자입니다.

trans-unit.source: viewId is not a member of the supported views collection.
trans-unit.target: viewId지원 되는 뷰 컬렉션의 구성원이 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that gets the control-specific collection of views.
trans-unit.target: 뷰의 컨트롤 관련 컬렉션을 가져오는 속성을 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 이 식별자는 UI 자동화 클라이언트 응용 프로그램에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 자동화 공급자 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers> 해당 필드를 사용 해야

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation> <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> 를 사용 하 여 검색 해야 하는 및</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation> 에 나타나지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.
